Klasyka gatunku przetrwania. Szybka rozgrywka, przyjemne strzelanie, polecam.

Left 4 Dead oyununda 4 arkadaşın dört bir yandan fırlayan zombilerle mücadelesine eşlik oluyoruz. Ancak oyun çoklu yön bakımından ön planda olduğu için tek kişilik senaryoya fazla takılmamak gerek. Zaten oyunun keyifli noktası da yine çoklu yönü.Takım halinde arkadaşlar ile oynanır ise keyifli saatler geçirebilirsiniz.

Really, one of the best multiplayer games I've played with friends. Looking back on this title I'd have to say that it was executed brilliantly in a way that brought challenging elements together like face paced teamwork with things youre more used to like zombie waves. Learn to aim and don't hog the meds is the name of the game, but if you want to claim the fame then be prepared to TAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAANK!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
Been playing since release and I can't put it down
Great old team-based zombie FPS. Worth getting for a lan/online games night with mates
Встретил в метро свою бывшую , выбил мозги так сказатб
I don't think Steam is gonna do it but I'll certainly play along.
